name: RizeGreymon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may play 1 yellow Tamer card from your hand without paying its memory cost. Any [On Play] effects on the Tamer played with this effect don't activate.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While you have 3 or more yellow Tamers in play, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
